data.title: Defender Boat Spam From Spawn Recon Bolt
data.description: Enable the team with this easy, yet effective Recon Bolt lineup. It'll scan Attackers executing the B Site and will grant you kills when spammed through the spawn smoke.

data.title: B Main Lockdown Utility Break Shock Bolt
data.description: Successfully break Killjoy's Lockdown at B Main with this B Site lineup, you'll need 2 Shock Bolts.

data.title: Quick B Main Recon Bolt From Close B Defender Spawn
data.description: This is a quick and simple Recon Bolt to scan the front side of B Main, that is often used toward the beginning of the round. The arrow is useful for gathering information on the front side of B Main without having to play on-site to do so, either as a change up for your default setup on site, or to best adapt to the circumstances in the round.
